name: Types of Architecture
description:
Designs of types of IT arquitectures like monolithic, microservices, serverless, containers, etc.


List of arquitectures:


  • Monolithics
  • Monolithics containers with Kubernetes
  • Microservices, DB centralizated
  • Microservices, DB per service
  • Microservices autoscale, DB centralizated (Kubernetes)
  • Microservices autoscale, DB per service (Kubernetes)
  • Mix of serverless microservice, DB centralizated.


Visit us in https://videsk.io.
